about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Mind Flowers is a narrative-driven psychological simulation with pixel art aesthetics, immersing you in a hauntingly beautiful dystopian world.

As a psychologist, you run a clinic in a decaying city, diagnosing patients with mysterious conditions named after flowers. Each case takes you deep into their memories, where you experience their past, uncover their struggles, and make life-changing decisions.

But be careful! A wrong diagnosis may lead them to irreversible consequences.

  • A deep and emotional storyline

  • Handcrafted pixel art visuals

  • A dark, immersive atmosphere

  • Decision-driven gameplay that shapes the world around you

Mind Flowers is not just a game; it's an exploration of the human mind and the fragility of emotions. Are you ready to uncover the truth? 🌸

content_descriptors.notes:
Mind Flowers contains psychological horror elements, dark themes, and emotional distress, including depictions of trauma, mental illness, and despair. The game explores sensitive topics such as self-harm, addiction, and emotional manipulation, which may be triggering for some players.

While there is no explicit sexual content, the narrative involves mature themes that reflect the fragile and unsettling nature of the human mind. Player discretion is advised.
